Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PixoTest POCT System comprising PixoTest POCT Analyzer and PixoTest A1c Test Kit for quantitative measurement of HbA1c in whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Used for quantitative measurement of glycated hemoglobin (%HbA1c) in fingerstick capillary and venous whole blood to monitor long term glycemic control in individuals with diagnosed diabetes mellitus; intended for clinical laboratory and point-of-care professional use, not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or use on neonates.
